220-Access is restricted to authorized persons only.
220 All traffic is logged and violators prosecuted to the full extent of the la
530 Login or password incorrect!
214-The following commands are recognized:
   ABOR   ADAT   ALLO   APPE   AUTH   CDUP   CLNT   CWD 
   DELE   EPRT   EPSV   FEAT   HASH   HELP   LIST   MDTM
   MFMT   MKD    MLSD   MLST   MODE   NLST   NOOP   NOP 
   OPTS   P@SW   PASS   PASV   PBSZ   PORT   PROT   PWD 
   QUIT   REST   RETR   RMD    RNFR   RNTO   SITE   SIZE
   STOR   STRU   SYST   TYPE   USER   XCUP   XCWD   XMKD
   XPWD   XRMD
214 Have a nice day.
211-Features:
 MDTM
 REST STREAM
 SIZE
 MLST type*;size*;modify*;
 MLSD
 UTF8
 CLNT
 MFMT
 EPSV
 EPRT
211 End

City Council

Latest News

View All

  1. Watch City Council Meetings on TV

    Regular City Council meetings are taped and broadcast throughout the week on Charter Communications (Local Access Channel 3). You can watch the most recent City Council Meeting daily at 10 a.m., 3 p.m., 7 p.m., and 9 p.m. Read on...

  2. Fair Housing Foundation

    The City of Huntington Park is contracted with the Fair Housing Foundation to provide assistance with rental housing issues for tenants and landlords. Read on...
/CivicAlerts.aspx

Download our mobile app for FREE on your iOS or Android device to report graffiti or illegal dumping.



City Calendar

View All
  1. Apr 10

  2. Farmer's Market in Huntington Park

    Fresh Produce and other items.
    Read On

  3. Mercado al aire libre en Huntington Park

    Vegetales y productos frescos.
    Read On
  1. Apr 13

  2. Egg Hunt, pancakes & picture with the Easter Bunny

    Join the Parks & Recreation Department's egg hunt, pancakes and picture with the Easter Bunny event.
    Read On

  3. Busqueda de huevos dorados, pancakes, y fotos con el conejo de Pascua

    Acompañe al Departamento de Parques y Recreaciones en una busqueda de huevos, pancakes y a tomarse una foto con el conejito de Pascua.
    Read On

  4. Free Household Hazardous & Electronic Waste Recycling Roundup

    Too Toxic to trash, drop it off at the free household waste recycling roundup. See flyer to find out the type of waste that will be accepted.
    Read On

  5. Recoleccion de Desechos Toxicos del Hogar y electronicos gratis

    Too Toxic to trash, drop it off at the free household waste recycling roundup. See flyer to find out the type of waste that will be accepted.
    Read On
  1. Apr 16

  2. Regular City Council Meeting

    To view agendas go to: www.hpca.gov.
    Read On
  1. Apr 17

  2. Farmer's Market in Huntington Park

    Fresh Produce and other items.
    Read On

  3. Mercado al aire libre en Huntington Park

    Vegetales y productos frescos.
    Read On

  4. Meet your Police and City Council

    Join us to meet your local police and the Huntington Park City Council. This meetings are designated to strengthen partnership between our community, police department and our City Council.
    Read On

  5. Conozca a su Policia y al Concilio

    Acompañenos a conocer a su policia local y al Concilio de Huntington Park. Estas reuniones estan designadas para fortalecer la relacion entre la comunidad, la policia y el concilio.
    Read On
/Calendar.aspx

Home

Spotlight

  1. Huntington Park Newsletter

    Read the latest issue of the Huntington Park Newsletter online.

    Read More

  1. planHP: Planning for the Future

    The City of Huntington Park is putting together its General Plan. Huntington Park residents are invited to participate in shaping the vision for the future of the City of Perfect Balance!

    Read More


  1. Drought Resources



    Learn about Huntington Park's new water restrictions and get tips on how you can help to save water.

    Read More
